title: ARAM only players missing a lot of features
body: Any chance we could get some inclusion into the crafting/mastery systems please, for those of us that just play ARAM?

replies.body:
Hey there,

As far as I'm aware, key fragments are meant to drop on modes such as ARAM, but it is currently not working as intended.

Once they fix this, you'll still have to buy chests or play norms to earn them but at least it's something.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208184086--March-23-We-re-aware-of-an-issue-where-key-fragments-don-t-drop-properly-outside-of-Summoner-s-Rift-and-we-re-working-on-a-solution-
